bug.author: deliahu
bug.summary: Document and revisit k8s availability zones
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Since changing to using eks.yaml for EKS configuration, the availability zones field may have changed to an array rather than a comma separated list. This should be confirmed, fixed, and documented (by showing the default value in config.md) as necessary.
